name: Free to love - Hand silkscreened women's ringspun cotton, V-neck t shirt
description:
Little bird materialized out of the dream to be free. 

Original design silkscreened in black over a soft 100% ringspun cotton, V-neck beige t-shirt. Great comfort and durability. Stretchy fabric. 

They fit great, so if you chose a more relaxed fit, we suggest you go for the next size up.

Every item is a unique one - we use our creativity and they are all hand silkscreened, so do not expect perfection reached through industrial methods.

Available sizes: small, medium, large & extra-large. Please request the size chart for more details and mention your size preference when ordering. 

Other available colours: black, white, light pink, marine blue, red, light blue, chocolate, beige. Upon request, we can print in different colours. Please contact us to check colours availability.

Wash in cold water, inside out, with like colours. Tumble dry low. Do not iron print. 

*

Items shipped to the USA - 5$ ($3 if shipped with another item).

name: Shaded graceful jellyfish - Hand silkscreened women's ringspun cotton, V-neck t shirt
description:
Shaded blue, white and red jellyfish. 

Hand silkscreened in shades of blue, white and red over a soft 100% ringspoon cotton, round neck marine blue t-shirt. Great comfort and durability. Stretchy fabric. 

Shades may differ from one item to another, keeping its inner handmade feeling. We can also ask us for different colour shades. Please check colour availability.

They fit great, so if you chose a more relaxed fit, we suggest you go for the next size up.

Every item is a unique one - we use our creativity and they are all hand silkscreened, so do not expect perfection reached through industrial methods.

Available sizes: small, medium, large & extra-large. Please request the size chart for more details and mention your size preference when ordering. 

Other available colours: black, white, light pink, marine blue, red, light blue, chocolate, beige. Upon request, we can print in different colours. Please contact us to check colours availability.

Wash in cold water, inside out, with like colours. Tumble dry low. Do not iron print.
